author: TravisEz13
body:
1. Include a serialized version of PSOptions in an includesymbols zip
1. Add a function which will create a zip package from the expanded includesymbols zip and a folder of signed files
1. add a function to restore an includesymbols zip as a build and populated PSOptions with the options
1. update related files

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
started a build at: https://mscodehub.visualstudio.com/PowerShellCore/_build/index?buildId=5708&_a=summary to verify
Passed

title: Allow packaging from a zip package to allow for signing
